message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: I swear, life was so much simpler back then.
Him: Yeah, just imagine no TikTok drama or influencer scandals. Jane Austen had it lucky! 😂

CONVERSATION 2
Her: Ugh, why can't things be like they used to be?
Him: I feel you, no ghosting or unsolicited "wyd" messages in Jane Austen's time. We really missed out! 🤷‍♂️

CONVERSATION 3
Her: It's crazy how different things were in the past.
Him: Right? No texting anxiety or overthinking if your message got "left on read." Jane Austen definitely had an easier love life! 😅

CONVERSATION 4
Her: Can we turn back time? Life was better before.
Him: I know, right? No swiping for potential dates or discovering they have a secret catfish profile. Jane Austen's world seems like paradise! 🙌

CONVERSATION 5
Her: I wish we could experience the simplicity of the past.
Him: Totally! No awkward Zoom dates or having to decode Snapchat streaks. Jane Austen had it all figured out! 😂
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : but that is how it was.  
    Him : Him : *its time. ok i give jane austen a pass. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
